short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the order of bells rung in ringingroom.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for the https://ringingroom.com/ virtual belltower site (and related subdomains).

This adds a "Ringing History" side panel showing a log of which bells have been struck, in what order and in which direction (hand or back). See screenshot.
This is useful information when learning method ringing for when things go wrong and you want to look back at exactly where a mistake was made.
